constructed.title: Constructed
constructed.description: Constructed dataset. Pattern: (x + y + z + w) mod 1 = 0

constructed_pca.title: Constructed (PCA)
constructed_pca.description: Same as 'Constructed', but processed using PCA

hypercube_faces.title: Hypercube (faces)

restricted.title: Restricted
